title: Software Engineer, Tools and Framework - Ad Platforms
summary: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Tools and Developer Framework Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, implementing, and maintaining the tools and frameworks essential for our software development lifecycle. This role will play a critical part in enhancing the efficiency, productivity, and quality of our development processes.
description:
Design and develop tools for functional integration tests, including developing mocks and managing test data libraries.
Testing, validating, and optimizing tool and framework designs for various types of testing including functional, integration, and Failure Mode Effect Analysis (FMEA)...
...
key_qualifications:
Demonstrated proficiency in Java, Groovy, Python, or Swift.
Atleast 3+ years experience in designing and maintaining test automation tools and frameworks by upgrading across various version of JDK, AWS library versions in addition to security vulnerability fixes in the code...
...
education_experience: Bachelor's or Master's degree in CS or related field.
pay_benefits:
At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $121,909 and $214,500 annualized, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location...
